Topic.Title: How do I update my gamebook?

Posts.EditableText: Hello, everyone. I have just updated a project of mine, and tried to upload it over the old file. When I play it, it still shows no differences from the old one, so I assume I might be doing something wrong. I've uploaded the first as a .zip file, just like I have been trying to do now. Is there something I am missing? Thanks in advance, and sorry for the most likely noobish question!
Posts.HTML: Hello, everyone. I have just updated a project of mine, and tried to upload it over the old file. When I play it, it still shows no differences from the old one, so I assume I might be doing something wrong. I've uploaded the first as a .zip file, just like I have been trying to do now. Is there something I am missing? Thanks in advance, and sorry for the most likely noobish question!

Posts.EditableText: Could you tell me the title of the game? Or write me a message indicating it.
Posts.HTML: Could you tell me the title of the game? Or write me a message indicating it.

Posts.EditableText: That **usually** happens to me. It may just be that you need to wait a bit to give your local network, the internet, and the textadventures.co.uk servers  a chance to digest the meal.
Posts.HTML: That usually happens to me. It may just be that you need to wait a bit to give your local network, the internet, and the textadventures.co.uk servers a chance to digest the meal.
